evidence.text:
Person B: We have to go outside to smoke that.
Person B: It’s been requested.
Person A: We’re watching a game.
Person B: It’s alright. It’s not worth it.

Person B: C’mon. Those are my sisters. I can call them bitches, you can’t.
Person B: Shhh! Stop. For real, I don’t need the drama.
Person B: Just lower your voice.
Person B: Quiet. For real, just shut up. You’re yelling.

Person B: I want to say bye to Vincent.
Person B: Okay, you coming in with me?
